oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Martha White - 1952-07-19 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Martha White sponsored Grand Ole Opry show from July 19, 1952. Hosted by Ernest Tubb.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ernest Tubb; Bill Monroe; Blue Grass Boys; Anita Carter; Little Jimmy Dickens; Moon Mullican; Crook Brothers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Martha White jingle -- Opening statement (Jud Collins) -- You Nearly Lose Your Mind (Ernest Tubb) -- Opening statement (Ernest Tubb) -- When The Cactus Is In Bloom (Bill Monroe and His Blue Grass Boys) -- Martha White jingle (Anita Carter) -- Martha White commercial (Jud Collins) -- Martha White jingle (Anita Carter) -- Hot Diggity Dog (Little Jimmy Dickens) -- That's Your Red Wagon (Moon Mullican) -- Martha White jingle (Anita Carter) -- Black Mountain Rag (The Crook Brothers)
